en.welcome:
Welcome to VideoDownloaderBot! ğŸ¬
Send me a link from YouTube, TikTok, or Instagram, and I'll download it for you.
en.help:
How to use:
1. Send a video link to the bot.
2. Choose the desired quality.
3. Wait for the download and upload to finish.

Commands:
/start - Start the bot
/language - Change language
/help - Help
/restart - Reset queue
en.lang_set: Language has been set to English! âœ…
en.invalid_link: Sorry, this link is invalid or not supported. âŒ
en.choose_quality: Choose the quality or download as audio:
en.added_to_queue: Your request has been added to the queue. Current position: {pos}
en.error_large_file: Sorry, the file size exceeds the limit (80MB). âŒ
en.error_download: An error occurred during download. Please try again later. âŒ
en.queue_restarted: Your queue has been successfully reset. âœ…
en.wait_current: Please wait until your current request is finished. â³
